title: Mouse stuck after ARAM ended
body:
Hi,
after one game ARAM my mouse got stuck and I could not click continue. Problem persisted even after alt+tab. Ultimately i have been forced to quit the game through taskmanager. The mouse has not been frozen, but attracted back to one place. I saw some posts from months ago about the same issue, usually not answered, so here I am reporting it is still happening.

replies.body:
Hmm...is this the first and only time that something like this has occurred?  Or have you been encountering it since?

Hit me up and let me know!
After 20 games of ARAM problem did not occurred again, so maybe just some little glitch. If something changes, I'll let you know.
So far only once, but I think I didn't play ARAM since then. I'll try few more games and post results.
Same here. Is your mouse stuck on the top left?
Yes in top left corner. After some alt-tabing it changed position somewhere in the middle, some 2 cm over the Continue button.
